member.name: M:Aptify.Applications.Marketplace.MarketplaceListingsEntity.Save(System.Boolean,System.String@,System.String)
member.summary: Saves the Marketplace Listing and, if the Status is changing to Approved from Requested or a new Marketplace Listing is Approved, an Order will be generated based on the information in the Marketplace Listing record.

member.name: P:Aptify.Applications.Marketplace.MarketplaceListingsEntity.ProductPriceObject
member.summary: Responsible for retrieving and instantiating the core Product Price object. The core Product Price meta-data is defined as a Product Pricing Entity Plug In in the Products Entity.

member.name: P:Aptify.Applications.Marketplace.MarketplaceListingsEntity.ProductPricePlugIn
member.summary: Retrieves the core Product Price Plug In meta-data. The information is retrieved from the Products Entity Plug In, Product Pricing.

member.name: M:Aptify.Applications.Marketplace.MarketplaceListingsEntity.DeterminePreferredCurrency(System.Int64,System.Int64)
member.summary: The User's Preferred Currency Type is based on either the Preferred Currency Type of the Company linked to the Person. If the Company does not have a Preferred Currency or the Person does not have a linked Company, the Person's Preferred Currency Type will be used. If the Person does not have a Preferred Currency Type, the system's Functional Currency will be used.

member.name: P:Aptify.Applications.Marketplace.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Aptify.Applications.Marketplace.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:Aptify.Applications.Marketplace.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Aptify.Applications.Marketplace.ListingTypeCache.ListingType(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method will either return a ListingTypeData object from the cache or, if the cache doesn't contain a ListingTypeData object for the Organization, the information will be retrieved from the database and used to populate a ListingTypeData object which will be added to the cache and returned to the caller.

member.name: M:Aptify.Applications.Marketplace.ListingTypeCache.Clear
member.summary: Clears the Marketplace Listing Types cache.

member.name: T:Aptify.Applications.Marketplace.ListingTypeCache
member.summary: Caches Marketplace Listing Types information. Shared, on-demand cache.
